revised_title: Catalogue of Double Stars and Their Characteristics
tldr: The author, Mr. Herschel, presents a comprehensive catalogue of double stars, including those that are treble, double-double, quadruple, double-treble, and multiple. The catalogue provides information on the size, color, distance, and position of the stars, as well as the dates when they were first observed. This work aims to contribute to the understanding of these celestial objects and their properties.
